# Documentation Generation

MACE generates comprehensive documentation for your compliance baseline.

## Available Formats

### HTML

Web-viewable documentation featuring:
- Interactive table of contents
- Searchable content
- Responsive design
- Print-friendly styling

### PDF

Professional print-ready documents:
- Cover page with metadata
- Table of contents
- Formatted rule details
- Page numbers and headers

### CSV / Excel

Spreadsheet exports for analysis:
- One row per rule
- All rule fields as columns
- Easy filtering and sorting
- Import into other tools

### README

Auto-generated markdown file:
- Build summary
- Rule counts
- Configuration details
- Quick reference

## Documentation Contents

Each generated document includes:

| Section | Content |
|---------|---------|
| **Overview** | Baseline description, author, version |
| **Summary** | Rule counts by section and status |
| **Rule Details** | Full information for each rule |
| **References** | Citations and external links |

## Rule Information

For each rule, documentation includes:

- Rule ID and title
- Discussion/rationale
- Check criteria
- Remediation steps
- ODV values (if applicable)
- References and citations
- Tags and metadata

## Customizing Output

Configure documentation in Build Settings:

- **Title** - Document title
- **Author** - Your name or organization
- **Version** - Baseline version number
- **Include Disabled** - Show disabled rules
- **Include References** - Add citation section

## Use Cases

### Compliance Audits

Provide auditors with:
- Complete baseline documentation
- Rule-by-rule explanations
- Expected vs. actual comparisons

### Change Management

Document changes for:
- CAB reviews
- Security team approval
- Historical reference

### Training

Use documentation for:
- Security awareness
- Admin training
- Onboarding materials

## Sharing Documentation

Generated documentation can be:
- Hosted on internal wikis
- Attached to tickets
- Shared via file sharing
- Printed for meetings
